Party:
Your Party (YP)
Minna no Tō みんなの党
(\Everybody's Party\")"
Comments: Conservative liberalism, Neoliberalism, Economic liberalism, Libertarianism, Anti-nuclear

Party:
Japanese Communist Party (JCP)
Nihon Kyōsan-tō 日本共産党
Comments: The Japanese Communist Party is Japan's oldest party. It was formed in 1922 as an underground organization in the Empire of Japan, but was legalized after World War II during the Occupation. It used to be a communist party, but the party has recently shifted to a socialist party.

Party:
People's Life Party (PLP)
Seikatsu no Tō 生活の党
Comments: Life Party was founded by Ichirō Ozawa and 14 other diet members who were in the Tomorrow Party of Japan after a leadership dispute between Ozawa and Yukiko Kada.

Party:
Social Democratic Party (SDP)
Shakai Minshu-tō 社会民主党
Comments: SDP is a social democratic party. It is a successor of Japan Socialist Party, which had been Japan's largest opposition party in the 1955 System

Party:
Green Wind
Midori no Kaze みどりの風
Comments: A House of Councillors parliamentary group founded in July 2012, temporarily registered as a party from November to December 2012, opposed to joining TPP, VAT increase, nuclear power. May merge with Tomorrow Party of Japan in the near future.

Party:
New Party Daichi – True Democrats
Shintō Daichi – Shinminshu 新党大地・真民主
Comments: founded in December 2011 by New Party Daichi and ex-Democrats, Hokkaidō regionalism, opposed to joining TPP

Party:
New Renaissance Party (NRP)
Shintō Kaikaku 新党改革
(\New Reform Party\")"

Okinawa Socialist Masses Party (OSMP)
Okinawa Shakai Taishūtō 沖縄社会大衆党
